page.title: 18Youth Hostel
page.content: At the present time the Youth Hostel has 3 dormitories,one with 20 beds,another with 12 and another with 8.Those who stay here have a choice of three meals for dinner and four for breakfast.It charges Â£1.40 for under 16's,Â£1.80 for 16-20's and Â£2.50 for over 21's.Breakfast is an additional Â£1.40.1/3 of the visitors are foreign,1/4 are school parties and the rest are individual travellers.The bedding can be hired for 50p or visitors may bring their own.It gets a lot of hostelers during the month of July_August.If you stay you may wake up at any time before 10:00am.It was first a holiday home.40 people are allowed to sleep together.Families or couples may sleep together if there is room.Now it is installing some showers.
